backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, ML predictions, and medical file metadata with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a deployment-related feature and its associated files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list mapping frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build planning.
frontend/DEPLOY_NOTES.md: Notes documenting fixes for frontend deployment issues involving env vars and provider composition.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring providers and TanStack Router routes for all screens.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: LocalStorage-based demo credential system handling account creation and password verification.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo authentication accounts and credential results.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Local session manager storing and validating OTP, password, and guest authentication states.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Implements deterministic command interpretation for navigation, medical queries, emergencies, and report-analysis triggers. Matches user input against patterns and returns structured command results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Renders the medical assistant UI with transcript display, speech recognition, TTS, and input handling. Manages status messaging, auto-scroll, and user interactions like sending messages and clearing history.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Handles saving, loading, and clearing assistant transcripts in localStorage using a versioned format. Provides simple persistence for conversations.
Defines TypeScript types for assistant messages, statuses, command results, and report-analysis context. Standardizes data structures used across assistant modules.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Provides the floating assistant widget that manages conversation flow, command handling, file-based report analysis, and integrates transcript and navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/assistant/medica: Provides a curated library of deterministic medical topics, disclaimers, clarifying questions, and emergency guidance. Used to generate consistent non-diagnostic health responses.
frontend/src/components/assistant/report: Implements deterministic text-based medical report parsing to extract findings, generate interpretations, suggest actions, and identify red flags. Includes pattern-matching utilities for structured and unstructured reports.
Extracts UTF-8 text from likely text-based files and validates for non-binary content.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useAss: Manages assistant message transcript with persistent storage and helpers to add or clear messages.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: Hook providing browser speech recognition with transcripts, interim text, errors, and control functions.
Hook to enable, trigger, and cancel speech synthesis using the Web Speech API.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useTra: Auto-scrolls a transcript container when new messages appear unless the user scrolls away from the bottom.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Renders a section header with title, optional caption, and optional action.
Configurable dashboard tile with icon, label, value, styling variants, and optional click interaction.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Surface wrapper providing styled container variants like default, elevated, and outlined.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Typography components for titles, captions, and body text with preset styles.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: Toggle switch to switch between default and Design B themes.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Provides a demo user profile generated deterministically for mock data.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Main app shell with header, footer, bottom tabs, assistant widget, and theme toggle, controlling visibility by route.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Bottom navigation bar with Home, Reports, and Profile tabs linked to router navigation.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Loads and saves the user's selected theme to localStorage.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines the Design B theme object and functions to apply or remove it by setting a data attribute on the document root.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Provides a React context for managing and persisting the active design theme, exposing theme state and a setter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Exposes helper functions to manage local auth session types and check validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Implements a demo OTP system with code generation, verification, expiry, resend cooldown, and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and logic for creating, loading, and managing Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMedicalFiles.ts: Wraps backend medical file operations (list, upload, delete, download) with React Query and actor integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains sample query hooks and a hook to fetch the current user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRedirectIfAuthenti: Redirects authenticated users away from public routes to /home based on Internet Identity or local session.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Guards protected routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to /signin using Internet Identity and session checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Resolves a display name using profile data, session info, or principal fallback via defined priority rules.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light, dark, and alternate design themes.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Implements a seeded random generator and utilities for generating deterministic fake user profile data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge for className merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Chatbot.tsx: Implements the medical chatbot page handling messages, report selection, file text extraction, and analysis flow.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Renders the authenticated health dashboard with metrics and quick action tiles.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundRedirect.tsx: Redirects unknown routes to /home on mount.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Displays and edits user profile details with validation, saving, and signâ€‘out logic.
frontend/src/pages/Report.tsx: UI for uploading, listing, downloading, and deleting medical report files using medical file hooks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Handles phone-based OTP, password sign-in, and Internet Identity login flows with validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Provides account creation with name, phone, and password, storing profile data and redirecting after successful signup.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Landing page with branding, hero image, and options to sign in or continue as guest.
frontend/src/profile/profileBackendMappe: Maps profile data between backend UserProfile format and frontend ProfileDetails, including blood type and date conversions.
frontend/src/profile/profileLocalStore.t: Manages localStorage-backed profile data per session, including loading, saving, clearing, and initializing profiles.
frontend/src/profile/profileTypes.ts: Defines editable ProfileDetails structure and helpers for creating and checking empty profiles.
frontend/src/profile/profileValidation.t: Validates profile fields including name, email, phone, and emergency contact, returning error messages and a validity flag.
frontend/src/profile/useProfileDetails.t: React hook that loads and saves user profile data from either backend via Internet Identity or local storage, using React Query.
Deprecated localStorage-based store for reading, writing, and deleting medical file metadata, kept for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/frontendEnv.ts: Provides access to frontend environment config, mainly resolving the Internet Identity URL with a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and included plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, issues, and deployment-related feature requirements.
